attributes.action: Award knighthoods to our surviving D-Day veterans
attributes.background:
Her Majesty said of our D-Day heroes at the 75th anniversary:

"The heroism, courage and sacrifice of those who lost their lives will never be forgotten. It is with humility and pleasure, on behalf of the entire country that I say to you all, thank you."

We think they all deserve knighthoods.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
